english.segment1: There's a smell upon the rose, and a thousand spirals before you reach the core, and I don't know why, But it makes me think of you, and how you might just love me, created me.
english.segment2: Draw the curtains, just let them fall, forget everything else, but just that I need you, only that I need you.
english.segment3: There's so many other loves, there's so many other things that suit me, but I think I'll choose you. You alone can quench my thirst, there's a fearful longing, and I can't make sense of it, I can't make sense of it, I can't make sense of it.
english.segment4: I'm am tired of living without you.
